name: imnang
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wal(s0, wi(w0, wn(w1))), wal(s0, wn(wa(w0, w1))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(w0, wn(w1))), wal(s0, wn(wa(w0, w1))))
-| wb(wi(w0, wn(w1)), wn(wa(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(w0, wn(w1))), wal(s0, wn(wa(w0, w1))))
-| wb(wi(w0, wn(w1)), wn(wa(w0, w1)))
|- wb(wal(s0, wi(w0, wn(w1))), wal(s0, wn(wa(w0, w1))))

comment: Quantified implication in terms of quantified negation of conjunction. (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jul-2021.)
